name: Eden's Sky Tower
description: The city of Eden has been fragmented and lifted from Earth and has been floating in the sky without humans for over a millennia. Amanu has awaken to this beautiful shattered floating city, but he is all alone and does not remember anything about himself. Solve puzzles, explore beautiful environments, glide through the sky and solve the mystery of Eden's Sky Tower. In your hands rests human's and Eden's fate. This is a game made with HomeTeam GameDev.
